properties.publicRemarks: Seller may carry financing! Turn-key 2.5 acre parcel with water, power, and road access in world famous Joshua Tree. Panoramic views of the boulder studded Little San Bernardino Mtns. Snow Caps on Mt San Gorgonio. Vistas of Bunker Mtn, Mt Bartlett and Copper Mtn. High priced homes in the area. The West Sunfair neighborhood is known for it's peace and serenity. Just minutes to organic restaurants, caf√©s, bars, boutiques and the JT Farmers Market in the vibrant downtown JT village. Ideal to build a designer compound. Horse property. Starry nights. Artists, musicians, and visionaries continue to gravitate to Joshua Tree, bringing new energy and style to the area. 9 miles to the Joshua Tree National Monument where about 3 million tourists visit the park annually. Hot vacation area. The location also provides easy access to nearby destinations like Palm Springs, just 42 miles away, and Los Angeles, approximately 130 miles. Buyers are encouraged to confirm building guidelines and utility availability directly with the County of San Bernardino and appropriate service providers. GPS coordinates for the property are 34.15025, -116.27839. The parcel number is 0605-013-05-0000 Property doesn't have an assigned address, the MLS address is for marketing use only. Joshua Tree in photo is apparently across the street. There appears to be no Joshua Trees on the property. Lot lines are approximate. Don't Wait! Call Now!
